meanings.sent1: The dress she wore to the party was the laciest one in the room.
meanings.sent2: Her laciest scarf was perfect for the chilly weather.
meanings.sent3: She felt like a lace queen in her laciest outfit.
meanings.sent4: The laciest clouds floated across the sky like delicate lace curtains.
meanings.sent5: The laciest details of the flower were mesmerizing.

meanings.sent1: This fabric is laciest among all the options.
meanings.sent2: Her dress was laciest, but her friend's was also quite lacy.
meanings.sent3: The laciest cake at the party disappeared in seconds.
meanings.sent4: The laciest branches of the tree swayed gently in the breeze.
meanings.sent5: The laciest snowflakes fell softly to the ground.
